casebody.data:
ERNEST W. TABOR, Appellant, v. WILLIAM VAN TASSELL, et al., Respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Speir and Freedman, JJ.

Decided May 3, 1880. This is an appeal by the plaintiff from a judgment and order denying a motion for a new trial on the min- . utes. This case involves only questions of fact. Vernon & Hill, for appellant. Hugh Reavey, for respondents. Speir, J.,

wrote for affirmance, with costs; Sedgwick and Freedman, JJ., concurred.
